pr_title: HOTFIX: Addres issue 822 where clicking link for remote API  fails

timeline.message: Don't allow collaborators to see details about the remote api
Display on text if the user does not have permission to modify the api

timeline.bodyText: Sorry for the overall format change, this is one line that was add (11)
timeline.author: joshsadam
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,41 +1,49 @@
 <!DOCTYPE html>
-<html xmlns:th="http://www.thymeleaf.org" xmlns:layout="http://www.ultraq.net.nz/thymeleaf/layout"
-	  data-layout-decorate="~{template/page}">
-<head>
-	<title th:text="${project.label}">Project</title>
-	<script th:inline="javascript">
-		window.project = {
-          canManage: /*[[${isOwner or isAdmin}]]*/ false,
-          page: /*[[${activeNav}]]*/ "settings",
-          label: /*[[${project.getLabel()}]]*/ 1,
-          id: /*[[${project.getId()}]]*/ 1
-        };
-	</script>
-    <script th:inline="javascript" th:if="${project.isRemote()}" th:with="status=${project.getRemoteStatus()}">
+<html
+  xmlns:th="http://www.thymeleaf.org"
+  xmlns:layout="http://www.ultraq.net.nz/thymeleaf/layout"
+  data-layout-decorate="~{template/page}"
+>
+  <head>
+    <title th:text="${project.label}">Project</title>
+    <script th:inline="javascript">
+      window.project = {
+        canManageRemote: /*[[${isAdmin or isOwnerAllowRemote}]]*/ false,

timeline.author: joshsadam
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,41 +1,49 @@
 <!DOCTYPE html>
-<html xmlns:th="http://www.thymeleaf.org" xmlns:layout="http://www.ultraq.net.nz/thymeleaf/layout"
-	  data-layout-decorate="~{template/page}">
-<head>
-	<title th:text="${project.label}">Project</title>
-	<script th:inline="javascript">
-		window.project = {
-          canManage: /*[[${isOwner or isAdmin}]]*/ false,
-          page: /*[[${activeNav}]]*/ "settings",
-          label: /*[[${project.getLabel()}]]*/ 1,
-          id: /*[[${project.getId()}]]*/ 1
-        };
-	</script>
-    <script th:inline="javascript" th:if="${project.isRemote()}" th:with="status=${project.getRemoteStatus()}">
+<html
+  xmlns:th="http://www.thymeleaf.org"
+  xmlns:layout="http://www.ultraq.net.nz/thymeleaf/layout"
+  data-layout-decorate="~{template/page}"
+>
+  <head>
+    <title th:text="${project.label}">Project</title>
+    <script th:inline="javascript">
+      window.project = {
+        canManageRemote: /*[[${isAdmin or isOwnerAllowRemote}]]*/ false,
+        canManage: /*[[${isOwner or isAdmin}]]*/ false,
+        page: /*[[${activeNav}]]*/ "settings",
+        label: /*[[${project.getLabel()}]]*/ 1,
+        id: /*[[${project.getId()}]]*/ 1,
+      };
+    </script>
+    <script
+      th:inline="javascript"
+      th:if="${project.isRemote()}"
+      th:with="status=${project.getRemoteStatus()}"
+    >
       window.project.remote = {
-        url: /*[[@{/remote_api/{id}(id=${status.getApi().getId()})}]]*/ '',
+        url:
+          /*[[@{/projects/{id}/settings/remote(id=${project.getId()})}]]*/ "",
         label: /*[[${status.getApi().getLabel()}]]*/ "",
